EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2018-03-22-Cloud-Migration-Webinar.Webcast Send
EmailTemplate.subject: [Webinar Recording] 3 Ways to Accelerate and De-Risk Your Cloud Migration with Turbonomic
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{Lead.First Name}},
Thank you for registering for the Turbonomic Cloud Migration Webinar on March 22nd.
If you were not able to make it or just want to check out the replay again, please visit our Cloud Migration Resource Center <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/accelerate-cloud-migration-projects]]>. It's a great place to learn how Turbonomic can help you accelerate and de-risk your cloud migration projects.
If you have any additional questions, please feel free to contact us at marketing@turbonomic.com. <[[mailto:marketing@turbonomic.com]]>
We hope you enjoy the recording!
Best, - The Turbonomic Team
